scene_description_enriched: Two haloed male figures stand on a green ground against a background of text. The figure on the left wears a red tunic and a purple mantle, holding a set of keys. The figure on the right wears a blue tunic and a pink mantle, holding a red book and a sword. The presence of keys and a sword are common attributes of saints Peter and Paul, respectively. The scene likely depicts these two apostles.
